translations: v.报复，反击；<古>就（伤害，侮辱）进行报复

phrs.translation: 报复, 回敬, 反击
以报复相威胁, 详细翻译

sentences.sentence: I was sorely tempted to retaliate.
It takes the most levelheaded and good-tempered of drivers to resist the temptation to retaliate when subjected to uncivilized behavior.
sentences.translation: 只有头脑最冷静、脾气最好的司机，才能在遇到不文明行为时抵制报复的诱惑。

sentences.sentence: It takes the most cool-headed and good-tempered of drivers to resist the temptation to retaliate when subjected to uncivilized behavior.
sentences.translation: 当遇到不文明的行为时，只有头脑最冷静、脾气最好的司机才能忍住不报复。
